text: Hajipurwadi is a village located in Vaijapur Taluka of Aurangabad district, Maharashtra with total 340 families residing. The Hajipurwadi village has population of 1560 of which 804 are males while 756 are females as per Population Census 2011. As per constitution of India and Panchyati Raaj Act, Hajipurwadi village is administrated by Sarpanch (Head of Village) who is elected representative of village. ==Nearest Villages== *Nalegaon ( 4 km ) *Bhatana ( 6 km ) *Garaj ( 7 km ) *Pokhari ( 8 km ) *Sakegaon ( 9 km ) Category:Villages in Aurangabad district, Maharashtra
title: Hajipurwadi
